content:
/>
XIV.4.B.3.
e
.
Releasing Non-FTI to a Member of Congress
Information which is not FTI, including income information provided to VA by an income payer including copies of
IRS Forms
W-2
or
1040, U.S. Individual Income Tax Return
, filed with the IRS, may be released to a Member of Congress only when the Member of Congress seeks the
information at the request of the beneficiary or someone authorized to exercise the beneficiary’s access right under these statutes, or
records on behalf of a Congressional committee with VA oversight jurisdiction for committee business.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 4, Section B - Federal Tax Information (FTI) Match: Safeguarding
